{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Intel_PRO/100_CardBus_II_(MBLA3300) |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = PRO/100 CardBus II (MBLA3300) |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/01/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Intel_PRO/100_CardBus_II_(MBLA3300) |sernum = |series = |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = Type II |vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 1229 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 200d |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |ethoui = 00:D0:B7 |chip1 = Intel;82559C (GD82559C); |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = e100 |windriv = |eth_ports = 1 |eth_speed = 100MbE |eth_conn = 8P8C |eth_conn_dongle = required, Intel MBCBL04 |eth_standard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Xircom |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 735858120760 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000K3I8B0 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Malaysia |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The '''Xircom''' logo and "(C) 1998" is silkscreened on the board of the card populating this entry. :The 82559 controller ([http://www.intel.com/content/dam/doc/specification-update/82559-fast-ethernet-multifunction-pci-stepping-information-spec-update.pdf per the 82559 stepping info sheet], this is is an 82559C) is marked with... ::*The big '''Intel''' '''i''' logo on the left side ::*GD82559C ::*L933IF72 ::*(M)(C)'99 ::*KOREA This card [http://www.northwesttechnical.com/index.php?main_page=product_info&cPath=&products_id=295&zenid=28405008580d66c12d36027f01fada7e?filter_id=25 appears to use the MBCBL04 dongle]. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.intel.com/p/en_US/support/highlights/network/pro100busii Support page]
[http://download.intel.com/support/network/adapter/pro100/pro100busII/GUIDEII.PDF User's Guide] (dated Feb. 1999)
[http://www.langalaxy.com/pdf/529.pdf#page=1&zoom=auto,40,1176 Product brief of the '''''PRO/100''' series'' on '''LANGalaxy.com'''] (dated 1999) [[Category:English Documentation]]
